channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 20:18 Air alert in Dnipropetrovsk region. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🔴 20:18 Air alert in Dnipropetrovsk region. Stay tuned for further reports. #Днипропетровська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 19:12 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: 🔴 19:12 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Take cover! #Chervonohryhorivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 4:47 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community

item.title: 🟠 14:01 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
